availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham Wamack (Butler County, Kentucky, farmer and Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Butler County, Kentucky, farmer and Justice of the Peace. Kentucky native. Married to Octavia Amanda Pierson Wamack in Butler County, Kentucky, on May 30, 1850. Father of Alexander Wamack, William M. Wamack, Elizabeth A. Wamack, James L. Wamack, and Mary T. Wamack. Farmer in Butler County in 1850. Farmer in Butler County in 1860. Appointed justice of the peace for District 3 in Butler County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
